name: Jacky Boy
description:
The game

In this game you take the role of a waiter. His name is Jacky Boy. But be careful, Jacky loves to drink, and when he drink, he destroy everything !

Our team

We are the team GruyereMakeItStronger in the Beginner category. We want to sleep.

Commands

All the commands are explained in the game. Just hit the "Commands" button.
